txt.en: You notice watch-towers at Fushuam Bal North that are not being guarded very closely at present. Destroying these would allow you to gain favour with the men of Fushuam Bal South.
The leaders of Fushuam Bal South are pleased with your efforts in destroying watch-towers at Fushuam Bal North.
Destroy watch-towers at Fushaum Bal North ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fushaum Bal is located in Talath Ãšrui.\n\nYou should destroy watch-towers in Fushaum Bal North.
Destroyed many watch-towers at Fushaum Bal North.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
